column4: how do I find a programs "system name" (i.e. "gnome-termina") or system path (i.e. /usr/bin/gnome-terminal ) of a window?
replace <command> with your program in question
I "don't know" the "command".  All I have is an opened window.  For example Alt+F2 opens a "run command" window and I want to know it's name or path.
